text: Va cun mijoni onho va on orzu, ki pazirisi imoni onho va nacot az azoʙ ast, cudoj afkanda sud, hamcunon ki ʙo digaron, ki cunin meandesidand va saxt dar suʙha ʙudand, niz cunin sud. Haroina, onho saxt dar suʙha ʙudand va zindagiro pajvasta ʙo gumoni ʙotil ʙa sar ʙurdand va ʙa hamin saʙaʙ imon naovardand
